author: Trithemius, Johannes, 1462-1516
title: Clauis generalis triplex in libros stenographicos Iohannis Trithemii abbatis Spanheimensis: ab ipso authore conscripta, et amatoribus huius artis gratitudinem declaraturis & secreto retinentibus communicanda
imprint: "Darmbstadii: excudebat Balthasar Hofmann: impensis Ioannis Berneri, ... , 1621"
